influx.token: token loaded from the '-D API_KEY=<key>' compile flag so it is not committed to source control

molefacts:
Naked mole rats weigh less
than a penny at birth

1/4 of the mole rats muscle
mass is in its jaws

Naked mole rats have 17
different vocalizations

Naked mole rats eat
their own poop

Naked mole rats don't drink water,
they get all the sustenance they
need from their plant-based diet

Thier teeth can operate
independently, so their uppe
front teeth can act like
a pair of chopsticks

Naked mole rats have a queen rat
similar to bees or ants

Naked mole rats have been found
to have very high pain tolerance
